bibl.title: PSI XIV 1415 recto: frammento di rendiconto di entrate e uscite
bibl.seg: Bianca Borrelli, PSI XIV 1415 recto: frammento di rendiconto di entrate e uscite.

Account of receipts and expenditure from Oxyrhynchus, dated to the 23rd year of an emperor (Antoninus Pius, Commodus or Caracalla). In particular, the surviving section of the document deals with the teeth (σκυταλαί) of the cogwheels of irrigation machines.
bibl.note: Account of receipts and expenditure from Oxyrhynchus, dated to the 23rd year of an emperor (Antoninus Pius, Commodus or Caracalla). In particular, the surviving section of the document deals with the teeth (σκυταλαί) of the cogwheels of irrigation machines.
